name: SubscribeBusinessServiceEntities
description:
Subscribe entities to a specified business service.

This tool subscribes specified entities to a business service, allowing them to receive notifications. It should be called when you need to add entities to the notification list for a business service.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the business service to which entities will be subscribed.

parameters.name: use_versioning_header
parameters.description: The API versioning header to specify the desired response format version.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: entities_to_subscribe
parameters.description: JSON object containing entities (user or team) to subscribe, each with an ID and type.

subscriber_id.description: The ID of the entity being subscribed

subscriber_type.description: The type of the entity being subscribed

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

subscriber_id.description: The ID of the entity being subscribed

subscriber_type.description: The type of the entity being subscribed

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
